title: SimpleNotes
description: Shareable notes and checklists app. AWS serverless stack — React frontend, FastAPI on Lambda, DynamoDB, Supabase Auth, CloudFront, and Terraform for infrastructure. Personal project to learn full-stack AWS deployment.

title: BabyLog
description: Baby tracking app. FastAPI + SQLAlchemy backend on AWS Lambda, React frontend with offline PWA support. Built to learn serverless infrastructure with Terraform.

title: HeyVoice
description: Voice cloning experiment using Qwen3-TTS on Apple Silicon. FastAPI backend, React frontend, S3 storage, Stripe integration. Runs AI inference locally — no cloud GPU costs.

title: USD Lint
description: Linter for OpenUSD .usda files. Rust-based PEG parser with 10 built-in rules for naming, hierarchy, and composition validation. Outputs to terminal, JSON, or GitHub Actions format.

title: Rosewood UI
description: Personal design system with CSS components, React wrappers, and PySide6/Qt components. Used across my other projects for consistent styling. Dark-first design.

title: Anvil
description: Rust-based package manager for VFX pipelines. YAML package definitions, dependency resolution, and DCC launcher with environment setup. Alternative to Rez.

title: OpenGrid
description: Lightweight production tracking tool — a simpler alternative to ShotGrid. Python SDK, FastAPI REST API, and React dashboard. Track assets, shots, tasks, and versions.

title: USD Asset Resolver
description: USD AR2 asset resolver with a Rust core and Python bindings via PyO3. LRU caching, SQLite backend, version resolution, and a PySide6 browser GUI.
